name: Ignosce
description:
Sypnosis

A surreal adventure 2d game with rpg style where you control a Stranger in a strange land. Try to get out of that place

Inspiration

Ignosce, inspired by various games made in rpgmaler, gamemaker. Games like Yume nikki, .flow, Yume 2kki, Oneshot and Omori were our main focus of inspirations. The player will experience being in a world similar to a dream, where the map is infinite and various surroundings lead to more places of the same style. In the future, is planned to place replayability elements and minigames, these would be elements inspired by games like Undertale and Oneshot

Credits

Programming: Masa500, Jamyrey

Art: AndyMuramas, Masa500, Jamyrey

Music: Masa500

Controls

Move: wasd / arrows

Interact: Z

Menu: X
